learning_objective: Modify, remix, or incorporate portions of an existing program into one's own work, to develop something new or add more advanced features.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has been practicing mindfulness and meditation and they want to create a meditation app for their school project. They started with a countdown timer code snippet they found online, but they want to add a feature that plays a calming sound at the end of the countdown. Which of the following modifications could achieve this!",
    "Answer1": "Add a procedure that plays a sound after the countdown procedure is done.",
    "Answer2": "Remove the original countdown procedure.",
    "Answer3": "Send a notification every time the countdown completes.",
    "Answer4": "Add a procedure that plays a sound before the countdown starts.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "The best way to add this feature would be to create a new procedure, which Alex could call after the main countdown procedure is done. This would let the app play a calming sound once the countdown is completed, providing a built-in cue that the user's meditation session is finished.",
    "code_snippet": "action Countdown:\n   integer count = 5 \n   repeat while count > 0\n       output count\n       count = count - 1\n       wait(1)\n   end\nend action"
}
